DOC.brief_summary: This study investigate effect Tulsi ( Ocimum sanctum Linn . ) metabolic biochemical parameter young overweight obese subject . Thirty overweight/obese volunteer divide two group . The first group receive intervention . The second group supplement one capsule Tulsi orally every morning even empty stomach 60 day . The metabolic parameter liver enzymes evaluate intervention .
DOC.brief_title: Effect Tulsi ( Ocimum Sanctum ) Biochemical Parameters Young Overweight Obese Subjects
DOC.detailed_description: This randomize , parallel group , open label pilot study investigate effect Tulsi ( Ocimum sanctum Linn . ) metabolic biochemical parameter young overweight obese subject . Thirty overweight/obese volunteer divide two group . The first group receive intervention . The second group supplement one capsule Tulsi orally every morning even empty stomach 60 day . The metabolic parameter liver enzymes evaluate intervention .
DOC.criteria: Overweight/obese volunteer gender age 17 30 year Addiction tobacco and/or alcohol . Not drug like fluoroquinolones , anticonvulsant , antihypertensive , corticosteroid , hormonal contraceptive , hypolipidemic agent , anti psychotic , protease inhibitor isotretinoin . Not suffer liver disease , malabsorption , nephrotic syndrome , thyroid disorder , allergy chronic disease .
